rows.label: qev025102_MSG0001
rows.name:
Er, have you decided to assist me with my
investigation yet, maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0002
rows.name: I really really need your help, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0003
rows.name:
Oh, good! Jim told me to ask another BLADE if I ever
needed help, and it seems he was correct.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0004
rows.name:
I would ask you to start with questioning, okay?
I have a specific human I want you to consult.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev025102_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask what Ackwar is going to do in the meantime.

rows.label: qev025102_JNK0020
rows.name: Get Down to Business

rows.label: qev025102_SEL0021
rows.name: Learn who Ackwar wants you to interview.

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0005
rows.name:
Er, well, I'll be investigating the scene.
The culprit must have left some trace behind, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0006
rows.name:
Meanwhile, I want you to go to a ridiculously delicious
business called Army Pizza, okay? So good.
So so so good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0007
rows.name:
If I remember correctly, the owner is named Powell?
He was close to Duduma, who is the...the victim.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0008
rows.name:
Ask about her past, okay? Maybe what she liked?
Whatever you can learn about her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0009
rows.name:
There is a ridiculously delicious business in the
commercial district called Army Pizza, isn't there?
So good. So so so good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0010
rows.name:
If I remember correctly, the owner is named Powell?
He was close to Duduma, who is the...the victim.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0011
rows.name:
Ask about her past, okay? Maybe what she liked?
Whatever you can learn about her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0012
rows.name:
Thanks, and good luck! I'm sure we'll crack this case
together, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0013
rows.name:
If if if we count this case as a murder, that makes five
Ma-non killed, correct?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0014
rows.name:
As a BLADE and as a Ma-non, I can't allow these
crimes to go unpunished, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0015
rows.name:
I'll be here searching the scene, okay? So maybe you
go see what you can learn from Powell?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0016
rows.name:
I've got about as much as I'm likely to get here, yes?
Did you find anything?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0017
rows.name:
Hmm? The victim, Duduma, had been fighting with
Gerome? That sounds suspiciously like a suspect, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_JNK0030
rows.name: Ask about the Suspect

rows.label: qev025102_SEL0031
rows.name: Find out what Ackwar knows about Gerome.

rows.label: qev025102_JNK0040
rows.name: Ask about the Case

rows.label: qev025102_SEL0041
rows.name: See if Ackwar learned anything from the scene.

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0018
rows.name:
Gerome is a BLADE, and an infamous Ma-non hater,
isn't he? He's well-known among my people, at least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0019
rows.name:
Duduma was hardly the only one Gerome's gotten into
it with, you know? Other Ma-non have reported that he
suddenly punched them out of the blue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0020
rows.name:
And she'd drawn his attention just before an unnatural
fall from a great height. Quite suspicious, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0021
rows.name:
I also recently discovered evidence that points to
Duduma being dead before she allegedly fell, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0022
rows.name: It adds up to a pretty strong case, yes yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0023
rows.name:
It's almost certain the victim, Duduma, was was killed
BEFORE she allegedly fell, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0024
rows.name:
It looks like a professional job, doesn't it? And since
Gerome is a BLADE... Well, you can see where I am
going with this, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0025
rows.name:
It's certainly enough to justify bringing him in for
questioning as soon as possible, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0026
rows.name:
...Although I, um, had a dinner date with Yuyu tonight
at Army Pizza, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0027
rows.name:
But I guess this isn't the time for that, huh? No. No no.
Sorry, Yuyu, but dinner will have to wait, won't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_JNK0050
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev025102_SEL0051
rows.name: Admire Ackwar's dedication to the job.

rows.label: qev025102_JNK0060
rows.name: Chide

rows.label: qev025102_SEL0061
rows.name: Remind Ackwar that he cannot work 24/7.

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0028
rows.name:
Are you the work-comes-first type as well?
I always always looked up to people like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0029
rows.name: I'll give Yuyu a quick call, okay? Just a moment...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0030
rows.name: Whoever I wind up with is lucky to have me, you say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0031
rows.name:
But Yuyu is the serious professional type, you see?
She'd so so kill me if I ditched work to be with her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0032
rows.name: I need to to to focus on the case for now, okay? Okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0033
rows.name: I'll give Yuyu a quick call, okay? Just a moment...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0034
rows.name: ...Hello hello, Yuyu?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0035
rows.name:
I'm really really sorry, but I can't make dinner tonight.
I'm at a crucial point in this case, you see?
That's okay, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0036
rows.name:
...Right. ...Yes yes yes. ...That's right. Okay.
Thank you, Yuyu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0037
rows.name:
Aw, Yuyu... I feel like I could do anything after hearing
your encouraging words, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0038
rows.name:
Okay, talk soon. ...Yes. Love love love you too.
Bye-bye.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0039
rows.name: Phew.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0040
rows.name:
I'm lucky to have a girl who's understanding about my
work, aren't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0041
rows.name: ...Hmm? Now can I lead the way to Gerome, you say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0042
rows.name:
Ha ha, right! Sorry, yes? So so sorry. Gerome should
be down near one of the commercial district's storage
areas, I think? I'll meet you there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0043
rows.name:
So, Gerome. I know you knew a Ma-non girl named
Duduma, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0044
rows.name: Then, um, maybe drop the silent act and start talking?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0045
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0046
rows.name: Ah, [ST:playername ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0047
rows.name:
I found Gerome, so so so I thought I'd get started with
the questioning, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0048
rows.name:
But the stubborn lug doesn't seem inclined to talk to a
Ma-non such as myself, does he?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0049
rows.name:
I think I'll leave this nut to you.
Er, for cracking?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0050
rows.name:
Gerome headed towards the park, it seems? Follow that
old Ma-non hater and and and see what you can find
out, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0051
rows.name:
Did did did you find Gerome? What happened?
And why are you so pale?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0052
rows.name:
...What? He was rigged with explosives? He's dead?
That's terrible, yes? So so terrible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0053
rows.name:
But why would... Does that mean he isn't our
murderer then? Er, perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0054
rows.name: Hmmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0055
rows.name:
Now I'm even more confused than before.
Maybe let's sort through this from the beginning?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0056
rows.name:
...Hm? Sorry, I've got a mail, it seems?
And Yuyu's the only one with this address, so...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0057
rows.name: Th-this this this photo... It's Yuyu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0058
rows.name:
She's been strung up in the Weeping Whitewood
over in in in Noctilum![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0059
rows.name: And and and there's a scirpo nipping at her feet![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_JNK0070
rows.name: Move Out

rows.label: qev025102_SEL0071
rows.name: Tell Ackwar that you need to move, now.

rows.label: qev025102_JNK0080
rows.name: Deduce

rows.label: qev025102_SEL0081
rows.name: Speculate that Ackwar knows the perpetrator.

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0060
rows.name: R-right! I've got to go save her, yes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0061
rows.name:
I don't know... I don't know, I don't know!
But I have to go save her, right? Right! Yes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0062
rows.name:
Did did did you find Gerome? What happened?
And why are you so pale?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0063
rows.name: ...What? He was rigged with explosives?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0064
rows.name:
And you defused them but he died anyway?
Poison or something, maybe? That's terrible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0065
rows.name: Hmmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0066
rows.name:
This mystery just keeps getting deeper and deeper,
doesn't it? But thank you. Without your help, we'd
have lost some critical evidence, wouldn't we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0067
rows.name:
I'll contact forensics and have them take a look at at at
his body, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0068
rows.name:
We we will arrest whoever is responsible, won't we?
I swear it, yes? Yes. Sworn.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0069
rows.name:
...Hm? Sorry, I've got a mail, it seems?
And Yuyu's the only one with this address, so...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0070
rows.name: Th-this this this photo... It's Yuyu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0071
rows.name:
She's been strung up in the Weeping Whitewood
over in in in Noctilum![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0072
rows.name: And and and there's a scirpo nipping at her feet![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_JNK0090
rows.name: Move Out

rows.label: qev025102_SEL0091
rows.name: Tell Ackwar that you need to move, now.

rows.label: qev025102_JNK0100
rows.name: Deduce

rows.label: qev025102_SEL0101
rows.name: Speculate that Ackwar knows the perpetrator.

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0073
rows.name: R-right! I've got to go save her, yes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0074
rows.name:
I don't know... I don't know, I don't know!
But I have to go save her, right? Right! Yes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0075
rows.name:
You killed Powell, yes?
...Then the case is closed, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0076
rows.name: I bet Yuyu would have been proud of me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0077
rows.name:
Whenever I'd get down, she was there to shake me out
of it, you know? To get mad and tell me to go back to
work. So yes, I think she'd be proud.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_JNK0110
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev025102_SEL0111
rows.name: Say Yuyu would be very proud.

rows.label: qev025102_JNK0120
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev025102_SEL0121
rows.name: Imply that Yuyu would want more from Ackwar.

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0078
rows.name:
You really are really really kind, aren't you?
I'm fortunate to have met you, am I not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0079
rows.name:
Yuyu... I hope you're out there somewhere enjoying a
pizza and looking down at me, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0080
rows.name:
I have to make sure this sort of tragedy never happens
again, you know? I can't ever give up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0081
rows.name:
Thank you. It's times like this when when that sort
of encouragement is is needed most, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0082
rows.name:
My detective career isn't over, no? As you say,
there is much more I can do, isn't there?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0083
rows.name:
And I'm sure Yuyu would be right beside you
telling me to keep at it, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0084
rows.name:
I need to to to make sure she can look down on
me and always be proud, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0085
rows.name:
I'm headed back to the city, okay?
But maybe let me give you this before I go?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0086
rows.name:
It's thanks to you we pinned down the killer's identity,
you know? You're the best partner a detective could
ever ever ask for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0087
rows.name:
But still, why would Powell do this? None of the people
he hurt were responsible for what happened to his wife,
were they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0088
rows.name:
All the Ma-non who died just loved the food he made,
you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025102_MSG0089
rows.name:
I guess that's all over now though, isn't it?
Such such a shame.[ST:wait ]
